title: Visit to the RBSA Friends Exhibition
excerpt: A great day out visiting the RBSA Friends Exhibition.
content: Just been to look at my pics in the Friends Exhibition at the RBSA in Brum with my wife, eldest daughter & few friends. Went for a meal, a few drinks and loads of laughs after. Good fun. Some quality artwork on display.

title: Android — Artwork of the Week
excerpt: My painting Android has been chosen as Artwork of the Week.
content: I am delighted that my painting "Android" has just been chosen as Birmingham Art Group's artwork of the week. My painting is included as one of the best artworks this week, from art groups all over the world.

title: Highly Commended for The Beacon
excerpt: Awarded Highly Commended for my painting The Beacon.
content: Blimey! I've just been awarded a Highly Commended certificate for my oil painting titled "The Beacon" which is currently on display in The Friends Exhibition at the Royal Birmingham Society of Artists in St Paul's Square. There are some quality works on display (see photos). Why not truck along and have a gander.

title: Selected for RBSA Friends Exhibition 2026
excerpt: Two works selected for the RBSA Friends Exhibition.
content: I am over the moon. I've just had my painting TheBeacon and drawing Big Boy chosen for the Royal Society of Birmingham Artists Friends Exhibition to be held in January 2026.

title: Featured Artist on Birmingham Art Group
excerpt: My painting The Beacon has been featured on Birmingham Art Group.
content: Really chuffed. I've just been chosen as a featured artist on the Birmingham Art Group Facebook page with my latest painting, "The Beacon".

title: RBSA Summer Show Opens
excerpt: The Summer Show has opened at the RBSA with my painting on display.
content: The Summer Show has just started at The Royal Birmingham Society of Artists. My painting "Rest In Peace" is on display. There are some superb artworks on show, so why not truck along and have a look. The exhibition is on for a month.

title: Rest In Peace Selected for RBSA Summer Exhibition
excerpt: My painting has been chosen for the RBSA Summer Exhibition.
content: I'm over the moon. I've just had this oil painting chosen for the Royal Birmingham Society of Artists Summer Exhibition. It's titled "Rest In Peace".

title: Rest In Peace Chosen for London Art Biennale
excerpt: My oil painting has been selected for the London Art Biennale.
content: I'm really chuffed. I've just had this oil painting chosen for the London Art Biennale Exhibition. It's titled "Rest In Peace".

title: Thinking About Chris Selected for RBSA Friends Exhibition
excerpt: My portrait has been selected for the RBSA Friends Exhibition.
content: I'm really chuffed. I've had this painting selected for the Royal Birmingham Society of Artists Friends Exhibition. It's titled "Thinking About Chris" and is a portrait of Kerrie Richards & Nigel McDonald. The exhibition is at the RBSA Gallery and runs from 9th January to 8th February. If it's anything like last year's exhibition, the quality of works on display will be first class, and it'll be well worth a visit. So why not truck along and have a look.

title: Opening Day at The Harley Foundation
excerpt: A great day at the opening with my niece Jen.
content: Had a fun time at The Harley Foundation opening do with my niece Jen today. Some real quality paintings on show. Pay it a visit.

title: Selected for RBSA Prize Exhibition
excerpt: Ghosts of old Park Hill chosen for the RBSA Prize Exhibition.
content: Good news — my painting "Ghosts of old Park Hill" has been chosen for the Royal Birmingham Society of Artists Prize Exhibition showing this September.

title: Ghosts of old Park Hill Selected for Exhibition
excerpt: My painting has been selected for The Harley Foundation Open Call Exhibition.
content: My painting titled "Ghosts of old Park Hill", based on reference photographs by Tim Ward and Shirley Baker, has been selected for The Harley Foundation Open Call Exhibition.
